resources.string:
Call Log Manager is an integrated call log app that saves you time and stress with its powerful viewing, backup, export/import, sharing, adding and editing capabilities. There is no call log app like Call Log Manager and it is a must have for every Android phone or tablet.


This call log app also comes with the handy features of single tap dialing and single tap Google search of any number.


The Call Log Manager app allows you to view call logs by different types including duration and location. It can display 100, 500 or all stored call logs at any time. The app also has powerful filter capabilities which allow you to see calls logs from specific location or duration.
